def has_water(x:item):
    # Function to check if the coffee maker has water
    symbol water_present = has_water(x)
    return water_present

behavior add_water_to_coffee_maker(faucet:item, coffe_maker:item):
    body:
        achieve_once close_char(char, faucet)
        # Ensure character is close to the faucet
        achieve_once is_on(faucet)
        # Turn the faucet on to fill with water
        achieve inhand(coffe_maker)
        # Hold the coffee maker to transfer water
        achieve close_char(char, coffe_maker)
        # Ensure character is close to the coffee maker
        achieve has_water(coffe_maker)
        # Ensure the coffee maker has water
        achieve_once is_off(faucet)
        # Turn off the faucet after filling the water

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind faucet: item where:
            is_faucet(faucet) and close_char(char, faucet)
        # Select a faucet close to the character
        
        bind coffe_maker: item where:
            is_coffe_maker(coffe_maker) and close_char(char, coffe_maker)
        # Select a coffee maker close to the character
        
        if not has_water(coffe_maker):
            # If the coffee maker does not already have water
            add_water_to_coffee_maker(faucet, coffe_maker)

def has_faucet_close_to_coffee_maker(faucet:item, coffee_maker:item):
    # Determine whether the faucet is close to the coffee maker
    symbol is_close=exists faucet1: item : is_faucet(faucet1) and close(faucet1, coffee_maker)
    return is_close

behavior turn_on_faucet(water_source:item):
    body:
        achieve_once is_on(water_source)
        # Turn the water source (faucet) on

behavior turn_off_faucet(water_source:item):
    body:
        achieve_once is_off(water_source)
        # Ensure the water source (faucet) is turned off

behavior fill_coffee_maker_with_water(coffee_maker:item, faucet:item):
    body:
        assert has_faucet_close_to_coffee_maker(faucet, coffee_maker)
        # Check if the faucet is close to the coffee maker
        if has_faucet_close_to_coffee_maker(faucet, coffee_maker):
            turn_on_faucet(faucet)
            # Turn on the faucet to fill water
        is_food_food(coffee_maker)
        # Fill the coffee maker with water
        turn_off_faucet(faucet)
        # Turn off the faucet after filling

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind faucet: item where:
            is_faucet(faucet)
        # Select a faucet
        bind coffee_maker: item where:
            is_coffe_maker(coffee_maker)
        # Select a coffee maker
        fill_coffee_maker_with_water(coffee_maker, faucet)
        # Complete the goal of filling the coffee makers water reservoir

)

behavior add_coffee_grounds(coffee_maker:item, coffee_grounds:item):

            is_coffe_maker(coffee_maker) and close_char(char, coffee_maker)

        # Add coffee grounds to the coffee filter

def is_coffee_filter(filter:item):
    # Function to check if a given item is a coffee filter
    symbol is_filter=is_coffee_filter(filter)
    return is_filter

behavior add_coffee_grounds_to_filter(filter:item, grounds:item):
    body:
        achieve inside(grounds, filter)
        # Place the coffee grounds inside the filter

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind coffee_maker: item where:
            is_coffe_maker(coffee_maker) and close_char(char, coffee_maker)
        # Select the coffee maker that is close to you

        bind filter: item where:
            is_coffee_filter(filter) and inside(filter, coffee_maker)
        # Select a coffee filter inside the coffee maker

        bind coffee_grounds: item where:
            is_food(coffee_grounds) and grabbable(coffee_grounds)
        # Select coffee grounds that can be grabbed

        add_coffee_grounds_to_filter(filter, coffee_grounds)
        # Add the coffee grounds to the filter inside the coffee maker

def has_coffee_filter(maker:item):
    # Check if the coffee maker has a coffee filter
    symbol has_filter=exists filter: item : is_coffee_filter(filter) and inside(filter, maker)
    return has_filter

behavior add_coffee_grounds(filter:item, coffee_grounds:item):
    body:
        achieve inside(coffee_grounds, filter) # Place coffee grounds inside the filter

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind coffee_maker: item where:
            is_coffe_maker(coffee_maker)
        # Select the coffee maker

        if has_coffee_filter(coffee_maker):
            # Check if there is a coffee filter in the coffee maker
            bind filter: item where:
                is_coffee_filter(filter) and inside(filter, coffee_maker)
            # Select the coffee filter

            bind coffee_grounds: item where:
                is_food(coffee_grounds) and grabbable(coffee_grounds)
            # Select coffee grounds

            add_coffee_grounds(filter, coffee_grounds) # Add coffee grounds to the filter
        
        else:
            # If no coffee filter is present, check for alternatives

    # Function to check if the coffee filter has coffee grounds
    symbol has_grounds=exists grounds: item : is_food(grounds) and inside(grounds, filter)
    return has_grounds

behavior add_coffee_grounds(filter:item, grounds:item):
    body:
        achieve inside(grounds, filter)
        # Place the coffee grounds inside the coffee filter

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind filter: item where:
            is_coffee_filter(filter) and has_coffee_grounds(filter)
        # Select the coffee filter that needs coffee grounds

        foreach grounds: item:
            if is_food(grounds) and not inside(grounds, filter):
                add_coffee_grounds(filter, grounds)
